reporter_caption.center: MANUFACTURERS AND TRADERS TRUST COMPANY v. WILSON, 277 App. Div. 1094 (1950)

caption.center: MANUFACTURERS AND TRADERS TRUST COMPANY, Respondent, v. MARGARET R. WILSON,
Appellant, and FRANK C. WILSON et al., Respondents.

court.center: Appellate Division of the Supreme Court of New York, Fourth Department.

opinion.opinion_text: Judgment affirmed, with costs. All concur. (Appeal from a judgment adjudging that a trust agreement terminated as to defendant Margaret R. Wilson in an action to account as trustee of an irrevocable trust.)
opinion.panel: Present â€” Taylor, P.J., Love, Vaughan, Kimball and Piper, JJ.
